name: rss-aggregator
description: Cloudflare Workers RSS feed aggregator for top tech blogs

scripts.db:import: python3 scripts/generate-import.py > scripts/import.sql && wrangler d1 execute rss-aggregator-db --file=./scripts/import.sql
scripts.db:import:local: python3 scripts/generate-import.py > scripts/import.sql && wrangler d1 execute rss-aggregator-db --local --file=./scripts/import.sql
